resources.string: Note: Rummaging for treasure will take you to a mode where there will be some swipable ads. Swipe left or right to add to your stash.
Note: Consulting the goblin seer will show you some advertisements. Watch the advertisement to the end and the goblin seer will reward you with a vision of treasure.
Note: To add to your stash quickly, you can select one of the options below to see an advertisement.
Thanks for supporting us. Watching videos allows us to bring you new features and content. :)
Thanks for supporting us. Each successful banner view allows us, the app devs, to bring you more happiness.
Our application is in alpha. Please excuse the lack of content! We are aggressively developing more content.
For any comments / concerns, please reach out to:
